name: Brijkishor Jagriti Sewa Samiti
briefDescription: Kishore Jagriti Sewa Samiti, Sitapur was established in year 2004 by a group of motivated people who were committed to contributing their time, skills and energies for the development and empowerment  of marginalized communities in Uttar pradesh. Brij Kishore Jagriti Sewa Samiti, Sitapur is a national level NGO committed to integrated Agriculture, Minority Develpoment, Environment, Education, Skill development, Rural Development, Book & Writers promotion, Youth welfare, Child  health & Education and development etc.  issues..
